To Speedily Prepare for Service.--Our schools have been established by the Lord, and if they are conducted in harmony with His purpose, the youth sent to them will quickly be prepared to engage in various lines of missionary work. Some will be trained to enter the 
                                                                           24
field as missionary nurses, some as canvassers, some as evangelists, some as teachers, and some as gospel ministers.--Letter 113, 1903.
